scripts.start: npm run scan:vcb && npm run scan:bidv && npm run scan:vietinbank
scripts.scan:vcb: cd ScanData/VCB && node vcb_method1.js && node vcb_method2.js && node vcb_method3.js
scripts.scan:bidv: cd ScanData/BIDV && node bidv_method1.js && node bidv_method2.js
scripts.scan:vietinbank: cd ScanData/Vietinbank && node vietinbank_method1.js && node vietinbank_method2.js
